name: cdeqnot
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, wff w0, wff w1

body.origin:
|- wcdeq(s0, s1, wb(wn(w0), wn(w1)))
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wb(wn(w0), wn(w1)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wcdeq(s0, s1, wb(wn(w0), wn(w1)))
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wb(wn(w0), wn(w1)))

body.origin:
|- wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wb(wn(w0), wn(w1)))
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wb(w0, w1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wcdeq(s0, s1, wb(wn(w0), wn(w1)))
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wb(w0, w1))

body.origin:
|- wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wb(w0, w1))
-| wcdeq(s0, s1, wb(w0, w1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wcdeq(s0, s1, wb(wn(w0), wn(w1)))
-| wcdeq(s0, s1, wb(w0, w1))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ CondEq(s0 = s1 →(¬ w0 ↔ ¬ w1))
⊣ CondEq(s0 = s1 →(w0 ↔ w1))

comment: Distribute conditional equality over negation. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 11-Aug-2016.)
